it is a well it looks like a regular assembly but you throw out all the
private bits and all the implementation so it contains exactly the same public API and it's interesting to use when
you're building multiple projects if your dependencies are reference assemblies then you don't need to
recompile and in that large solution if you make a change and you compile your
project if the reference assembly didn't change you can identify that oh this other project doesn't need to change
because that dependency didn't change basically this has been around for a

it needs to know everything that came before it but because a signature file
